com.teleca.jamendo.widget
类 RemoteImageView

java.lang.Object
  ImageView
      com.teleca.jamendo.widget.RemoteImageView

public class RemoteImageView
extends ImageView

ImageView extended class allowing easy downloading of remote images

作者：
Lukasz Wisniewski

方法摘要
 void setDefaultImage(Integer resid)
          Sets default local image shown when remote one is unavailable
 void setImageUrl(String url)
          Loads image from remote location
 void setImageUrl(String url, int position, ListView listView)
          Loads image from remote location in the ListView

方法详细信息

setImageUrl

public void setImageUrl(String url)
Loads image from remote location

参数：
url - eg. http://random.com/abz.jpg

setDefaultImage

public void setDefaultImage(Integer resid)
Sets default local image shown when remote one is unavailable

参数：
resid -

setImageUrl

public void setImageUrl(String url,
                        int position,
                        ListView listView)
Loads image from remote location in the ListView

参数：
url - eg. http://random.com/abz.jpg
position - ListView position where the image is nested
listView - ListView to which this image belongs
